nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:enchanted_book","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Enchanted Book\",\"color\":\"white\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"Cleave IV\",\"color\":\"blue\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Deals \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"20% \",\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\"of your damage\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"dealt to other monsters within\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"4.2 \",\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\"blocks of the target.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Use this on an item in an Anvil\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"to apply it!\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Source:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"I-V: \",\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\"Enchantment Table,\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"Pufferfish Collection\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Applied To:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Sword\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Fishing Weapon\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Longsword\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Gauntlet\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"COMMON\",\"color\":\"white\",\"bold\":true}"]}}
